title: pantheon needs to get fucking nerfed
body:
He is insanely broken as a jungler right now, you cant escape his ganks cause of chilling smite soon as he gets warrior he can 100-0 anyone on your team including your tanks
He has 0 counterplay point click gap closing stun and his heartseeker + spearshot do insane ammount of damage for how much tank he can build.
ive never seen a pantheon do horrible unless they are on my team then they are just trash
a pantheon with warrior just qudra killed my team....
he hit me for a 700 spearshot as adc with just the warrior item.
